title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing blood in a dream for a married woman: Seeing blood is one of the visions that leave negative effects on the soul. Blood creates fear and revulsion in the heart. In this regard, we find agreement among the majority of jurists on the dislike of seeing blood because of its repulsive connotations, and in this article we mention all the connotations and details of the appearance of blood. For a married woman, we also take into account the circumstances that affect the context of the dream, both positively and negatively. Seeing blood in a dream for a married woman. The blood of a married woman indicates menstruation, childbirth in the near future, or pregnancy if she is suitable for that. If the blood is a lot, it is a serious illness. It is an indicator of the timing of the menstrual cycle, as it is one of the self-talks and fears that disturb her, and if the blood is on the man, then this. It is injustice and gossip. If she sees that she is drinking blood, this indicates hidden hatred and malice, and if blood comes out of her nose, this indicates the end of the quarrel between her and her husband, the repair of her relationship with her relatives, and the way out of adversity and adversity. Seeing blood in a dream is for a woman married to a son. Ibn Sirin believes that blood is an abomination and there is no good in it, and it indicates deception, hypocrisy, lying, suspicious money, committing disobedience and sins, following one’s desires, and stirring up temptations and doubts. And whoever sees blood on her clothes, this indicates that someone is making an accusation against her and ascribing to her something that is not hers, and she may be exposed to deception and lies. Whom she trusts, and if she sees anyone. Spilling blood on her, and slandering her with obscene words. If you see blood bleeding from her ear, this indicates that she is hearing something bad, and if she is stained with blood, this indicates that she is acquitted of the accusation against her. Seeing blood in a pregnant woman’s dream. The blood of a pregnant woman symbolizes illness, pregnancy problems, or miscarriage. On the contrary, it may be an indication of the approaching period of menstruation or exposure to a disease from which recovery is short. Whoever sees blood while pregnant will give birth soon and prepares to pass this stage safely. This vision also expresses the ease of her birth, freedom from dangers and evils, overcoming obstacles and difficulties, and achieving safety. Vision. Menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman: Menstrual blood indicates the outbreak of disputes and problems between her and her husband and the cessation of worship and duties. Menstrual blood may reflect the approaching menstrual period and preparation for it. Menstrual blood also indicates committing sins and misdeeds and violating the Sunnah and common sense. If she washes after menstruation, this indicates repentance. Of sin, avoiding mistakes, thinking before quarreling, abstaining from temptation, and fighting desires. Seeing blood on clothes in a dream for a married woman. If a woman sees blood staining her clothes, this indicates the humiliation of those who conspire against her, slander her honor, make accusations against her, and weave around her. False stories, and she is innocent of all of this. If she sees that she is washing her clothes, this indicates her innocence of a fabricated accusation, and the vision expresses chastity, chastity, providing sustenance, justice, bringing out facts, and ending unresolved matters. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing blood on the garment indicates deception and lying, This is about a story

title: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Seeing money in a dream is an interpretation of seeing money in a dream. It is one of the most common dreams that people have, which has many connotations and interpretations. The interpretation of seeing money in a dream varies, whether the money is paper or metal, in addition to the dreamer’s condition. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Through the site, we will get different. On the interpretation of seeing money in a dream, there are a large number of commentators, including: Seeing money in a dream indicates a person who shows people the opposite of what is inside him or wants a financial or psychological return for everything he does, and this seems like a show off. Seeing money in a dream is evidence of the benefits and advantages that accrue to him. The owner of the vision in order to raise his social status and achieve many victories. Seeing money in a dream is a sign of achieving what the person desires and his ability to impose complete control and control. Seeing money in a dream is evidence of strife and problems between people to achieve some worldly goals. Which - which vision Money in a dream: If its color is red, like the red dinar, then it indicates religion, the strength of faith, and fulfillment of duties. Seeing a person in a dream that he is carrying money to his house is evidence that his house is full of money in reality. If a person sees that he is throwing money from his house, this indicates that he will be liberated. Of worries and problems. Distributing money in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of distributing money in a dream. The dreamer was a good person. Interpretation of distributing money in a dream is also a sign of gaining affection among people. The vision may be an indication of occasions and celebrations that the dreamer will witness soon. Seeing someone in a dream Getting rid of money or distributing it to people is evidence of getting rid of problems and worries. If a person finds paper money on his street in a dream, this means that his problems will increase with the increase of money. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a snake chasing me in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretations of receiving banknotes in Dream: If a person sees in a dream that he has obtained a piece of money, this is evidence that God will bless him with a good son who is good for his parents. Seeing paper money in a dream is an indication of the loss of one of his children. Seeing paper money in a dream indicates the success of the dreamer in the projects that he will enter into. And achieving ambitions and dreams. Seeing paper money in a dream has more than one meaning, such as money, worries, and heartaches, so it indicates problems and anxiety far from the dreamer’s life. Money in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Seeing money in a dream above the fourth, this vision is considered unpleasant, because it means listening To an unloved person, receiving favorable news, hearing sad news or something unpleasant happening to a loved one. If a person sees money in a dream and its number is clear, this is evidence of kindness to the owner of the vision. Whoever sees that his money was stolen and gave it to someone And lose it, this is a sign of getting rid of crises, worries and sadness. Seeing someone who gave visual money is evidence that you have been wronged. Seeing banknotes in a dream and throwing them in the street away from

title: What does fish mean in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What does a fish mean in a dream? Interpreters believe that the dream portends good things and portends many wonderful things to the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin What does a fish mean in a dream? What is the interpretation of fish in a dream? It indicates the abundance of food and the improvement of material conditions, and if the dreamer sees himself catching fish, this will lead to a large sum of money reaching him without trouble or fatigue. If the dreamer sees himself taking the fish out of the river, the vision may indicate that he is committing some sin or neglecting to do so. Some duties, and the dream carries a message telling him to return to God Almighty and repent. For him and we walk on the straight path. If the dreamer catches a fish from an unclean pond in his dream, the dream portends bad luck and indicates many annoying things and problems that will happen to him in the coming period. The dream may also indicate that the Lord (the Almighty and the Most High) will test the dreamer’s patience by killing the blessings at his hands. What does fish in a dream mean by Ibn Sirin? Seeing a brown fish in a dream means success in professional life due to the choice of successful and diligent business partners. If the dreamer sees himself eating Fish in a dream, and its taste is salty, this indicates that he is very tired and working hard to meet the material needs of his family. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing four fish indicates that the dreamer will marry four women in the future, but seeing a lot of fish symbolizes abundant livelihood and earning a lot of money. Money. The unit includes interpretation of dreams on an Egyptian website. From Google, there are many interpretations and questions about followers that you can see. The meaning of fish in a dream for a single woman. A fish in a dream for an unmarried woman portends to her goodness and abundant happiness that will soon knock on her door. If the appearance of the fish is beautiful in the dream and its colors are happy , the vision indicates the approaching marriage with a person she loves very much and with whom she will live happily for a lifetime. It indicates the fulfillment of a desire soon or the fulfillment of a certain desire that the dreamer wanted. If the same dreamer sees himself eating fish in a dream, this means that he will soon receive a beautiful gift from someone he loves. And he will be very happy with it. If an unmarried woman is living a love story in reality and she sees herself fishing in a dream, this means that her lover will propose marriage to her soon. The meaning of fish in a dream for a married woman: If the dreamer sees her husband giving her a fish, then the vision indicates an abundance of food and an increase in In money, the dream is said to indicate pregnancy if she has not given birth before. If the same dreamer sees herself eating fish in a dream, this means that she will feel stable and happy in her married life because of the love and mutual respect between her and her husband. The dream indicates that the dreamer’s husband will receive Soon he will receive a promotion at work, his salary will increase and his financial situation will improve, which will lead to many positive developments in their lives. If the dreamer is planning to start a new project in her career, the dream brings her good news about the success of this project and great achievement.

title: Interpretation of a dream about perfume

preview.html: Have you ever seen perfume in a dream? Did you know that this vision has been well interpreted by many people and can be seen by every person depending on what is required? Today we will find out what is the interpretation of seeing perfumes, is it a good thing or not seeing it is considered... Favorite visions for many, follow us to learn more about them. Seeing perfume in a dream. Many scholars have previously seen perfumes in a dream as one of the most beautiful dreams and visions that a person can see and enjoy, as we can identify them as follows: Seeing perfumes indicates an increase in... In everything that is good in terms of nutrition and abundance of goodness, as well as knowledge and more. Some may see a beautiful smell of perfume indicating that Saladin and this person are following the teachings of his religion. But when a man sees a bottle of perfume, this indicates his beautiful future wife whom he will marry soon. When You buy perfume in a dream, this indicates the presence of prosperity and goodness to come. On the contrary, it indicates separation and abandonment. There are those who see the gift of perfume in the eyes of that person in love with those around him. In the case of using perfumes, this is good for managing the home and things surrounding the person, and it can be a great indicator. On the intelligence of that person. If a girl sees that she has a beautiful bottle of perfume, this is evidence of her good morals and great religion. Seeing perfume in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried girl can see in her dream a fragrant perfume bottle and does not know to what extent this could indicate, so we will find out Today on all the points that can clarify this vision: Seeing perfumes in a dream is strong evidence of the good morals of this girl in addition to her beautiful soul that she possesses everywhere. When a girl buys perfume, this is evidence that her marriage to a very suitable and good man is approaching, or She knows someone who will be her husband. And when she inhales the beautiful scent of perfume, this is a sign of good news that will come to her. Seeing perfume in a dream for a married woman. There are also many indications that a married woman sees perfume in a dream, and that it is considered one of the things that her body is made of, and she should To look for it in the good news, as follows: Seeing perfume in a dream is a strong indicator of the comfort and stability that a married woman feels in her life. You also see that she is buying perfume to show the love between her and her husband and that he loves her very much. And in the event that she sprays perfume This is evidence that she is expecting happy news, whether it is pregnancy or abundant nutrition and money in the near future. Seeing perfume in a dream for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman can see the perfume of her dreams or that she is spraying it and other interpretations, and all of this can actually indicate many signs The very beautiful one that has this shape: A pregnant woman seeing perfume is evidence of the safety of her fetus and that everything will be fine, as well as her easy and good birth. If the same bottle appears, this indicates that she is a female and must be well prepared for her. And if the woman sprays perfume on the body all

title: Interpretation of seeing part of bald hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a bald part of hair in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a bald part of hair, whether a single woman, married, pregnant, or divorced, with its various connotations. Today, through the Ruya website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing part of bald hair in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing baldness in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream becomes bald. It shows that He is severely depressed. Seeing an unmarried bald woman in a dream indicates her shortcomings in her religion. Seeing baldness in a dream says that he has incurred a major financial loss. Seeing a bald person in reality is bald in a dream, declaring the pleasure and joy that comes to him and an extensive diet. Seeing a bald man in A dream indicates a loss of respect and appreciation among people. Interpretation of baldness in a dream and hair loss. A man sees the hair on his head falling out and thick hair appears in its place. This indicates that he is exposed to many problems and obstacles. Seeing a man losing his hair and hair appearing in its place indicates that he has committed many sins and mistakes in his life. Seeing the dreamer falling from one place rather than another indicates the oppression he exerts on the woman in his life, who may be his wife, sister, or someone else. Interpretation of seeing baldness in one’s dream: She sees a bald single man in her dream indicates a serious psychological crisis. Seeing baldness in one’s dream symbolizes sadness, loneliness, and depression in her life. Seeing gaps in single hair in a dream indicates the instability of her emotional life. Seeing the thin hair of a single woman in a dream shows that she has lost confidence in herself. Seeing an unmarried woman losing her hair and looking more beautiful than it indicates the end of worries, problems, and positive changes in her life. Interpretation of seeing baldness for a married woman in A dream about seeing a bald woman in her sleep showed the instability of her married life. Seeing baldness in a married woman’s dream indicates a serious financial crisis. Seeing baldness for a married woman, but she is satisfied with it. The vision showed positive changes in her life. Seeing a married woman that the front of her head is bald indicates the sadness and anxiety that she suffers from in her sleep. Her married life. Interpretation of seeing baldness for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth to a bald child is a sign that she has given birth to a beautiful and beautiful child. Seeing a pregnant woman bald on the front of her head indicates that there are problems between her and her husband, but they will soon end. Interpretation of baldness for a man in a dream. Seeing baldness in a man’s dream indicates To good changes in his life that will lead him to a better situation. Seeing a man marrying a bald girl in a man’s dream shows that he has faced many problems in his life. Seeing a single man marrying a bald girl shows that he is afflicted with illness. Seeing a man running away from a bald man in a dream indicates the presence of many obstacles, fears, and problems that The dreamer is trying to overcome or stay away from her. Seeing a man bald on the front of his head indicates his injustice to his wife and his failure to treat her with tenderness and mercy as God Almighty commanded. A sick person sees baldness on the front of his head.

title: Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a single woman. Many people search for an interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a single woman, because cutting hair is a natural thing that both women and men do, and dream interpreters confirm that cutting hair is actually one of the things that indicates a new beginning and has many interpretations. The other, so in this article we will present the interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a single woman, on the website. Various. Interpretation of a dream of cutting hair in a dream. In general, some scholars believe that the dream of cutting hair is one of those dreams that has many good meanings, including that a person gets rid of negative feelings. And many problems facing his life in general. But on the other hand, some commentators believe that this dream is not a good dream, which indicates that the person has lost energy and will be impulsive in many of the things he does in his life. Seeing a haircut indicates the disappearance of sadness and worries in The dreamer’s life. Seeing hair cut in some dreams indicates the loss of a family member or someone close to the dreamer. Seeing hair cut in a dream indicates a change in life for the better and achieving happiness through achieving goals. If a man sees that someone is cutting his hair, this means Insecurity in life and the need for help. Cutting hair in a dream may indicate that this person is able to get rid of all the bad aspects of his life and is able to solve any problems he may face. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for single people indicates that The girl in general is dissatisfied with her general appearance. It also shows the girl’s interest in something in her life, and it may express that the girl is exposed to health problems or general suffering from disorders. If an unmarried girl sees someone cutting her hair in a dream and she does not know this person, this indicates the girl’s marriage date or Her engagement, and perhaps this is a sign of success in study or work. Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for an unmarried woman and someone cutting her hair, this indicates the intense love that this person has and his desire to be with this girl. Imam Fahd Al-Asidi says that the girl An unmarried woman who cuts only the ends of her hair in a dream shows the girl’s ability to change her behavior for the better in the next stage. Interpretation of dreams for a single woman’s haircut by a well-known person. The interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for single people indicates that in the next stage of her life the girl will find a change in her life, especially On the emotional level, the vision is a sign of a new existence, that is, a person will appear who will enter the girl’s life, and on the professional level there will be a change for the better, and the girl can find a new job. The interpretation of cutting hair in a dream indicates that a very great responsibility falls on the shoulders of Girl, the matter has become more than it should and it has become psychological pressure. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream with her long hair and cutting it indicates the loss of a loved one. Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for an unmarried woman while she is crying indicates that the girl is doing something she does not want or that there is anxiety. Big

title: Interpretation of green apples in a dream Green apples in a dream

preview.html: Seeing green apples for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man eating green apples, buying cuttings and picking them from a green apple tree, giving the apples as syrup juice by Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi, Fahd Al-Usaimi and others. Green apples in a dream are among the dreams that appear to us in many From our dreams, in many different forms, which have many important interpretations, as apples are a fruit with a sweet and pleasant taste and different colors, including red, green and yellow. The meaning of the appearance of an apple tree in a dream is evidence of many desires that you want in your life, and what this means is that the person sees that he is picking an apple from the tree during the apple ripening season. However, if he chooses them at an inappropriate time, that is, before the appropriate time to collect them, then this is an indication that the dreamer has run out of patience and is in a hurry to take matters into his own hands. Interpretation of Green Apples in a Dream If a fortuneteller sees a man or a girl with green apples in a dream, this is evidence of... His good origin and pure intentions. Seeing apples in general in a dream symbolizes the fruit of the “tree of good and evil,” as the legend refers to betrayal, treachery, or immorality when Adam disobeyed the word of God because of Eve, which prompted and tempted him. To eat an apple from the only tree from which they were deprived of eating. But specifically, green apples in a dream symbolize pessimism and boredom, but this vision differs between men and women and between unmarried, pregnant and married women. For a man, seeing green apples indicates familiarity To the other party who sees it in the dream, while eating it means forgetting one’s parents and rights. As for single, married and pregnant women, dreaming of green apples has many positives, while eating green apples indicates adultery and corruption and that the woman desires someone other than her husband if she is pregnant or married. Likewise, a green apple for a pregnant woman in a dream indicates the earliest date of childbirth and marriage for an unmarried woman. Whoever sees green apples in a dream means that he will be cured of illness. If a green apple is cut in a dream, the dreamer will see a painful separation from a very close and dear person. Seeing green apple juice in A dream is evidence of abundant livelihood and halal profit, God willing, while cooking apples in a dream is evidence that a person will face a health crisis in the coming periods. In general, seeing green apples indicates legal money, while sour apples indicate illicit money. Interpretation of green apples in a dream by Ibn SirinIf one sees In a dream, whether it is a man or a girl, that he gives a green apple as a gift to someone he knows, or that someone gave him a green apple that he saw before, this is evidence that there will be intimacy between them in the future and the relationship will be possible for them. If the dreamer sees in a dream That someone he knows from his family or relatives gives him a green apple when he is in fact dead, this is his interpretation that the dead person will have a share in the

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat: A large number of dream interpreters see that eating cooked meat means that he is rich and has a lot of money, which makes the dreamer stable and happy, while watching it without eating it may have some unwanted connotations, and we discuss in our topic what is the interpretation of a dream about eating meat cooked? What are its different meanings? Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat? Eating cooked meat in a dream indicates many happy things that a person will reap soon, in which he will not have to make any effort or feel any difficulties. Some claim Commentators say that eating cooked lamb is a sign of meeting a person known to the fortuneteller who has been absent for a period of time. A person’s awareness and culture increases with his awareness of this vision, and he acquires a lot of knowledge and is always ready to increase it and benefit from it in his life in general. But if the dreamer is exposed to To eat it and it was rotting and he felt severe pain in his stomach, then after this vision he confirms that he has a serious illness, and God knows best. If this meat is not cooked, the interpretations related to the dream become undesirable, because the dreamer may face bad events that will cause him many crises in the coming period. See Interpretation experts indicate that cooking meat for eating is good news for the dreamer, and whoever is single will get married soon and his financial conditions will improve, which will help him complete this matter. What is the interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat by Ibn Sirin? There are expectations that the scholar Ibn Sirin places on eating cooked meat, and most of them favor blessings. The kindness and abundance that the dreamer obtains and changes regardless of the circumstances that cause him sadness. Ibn Sirin puts forward different possibilities in interpreting this dream, which is traveling to earn a living, that is, for work, and a person can obtain it if he finds himself eating bird meat. He says: The cooked meat taken From the camel is evidence of a person’s victory over his enemy, and that he takes a lot of his money while he is awake, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin tells us something else about this dream, which is the dreamer’s tendency to follow some temptations and follow the things he imagined for himself, which could be wrong in many cases. Situations, and hence desires must be overcome and controlled so that the individual may achieve happiness. It is possible that this dream has some interpretations related to the future, and this happens if the person eats it and feels that it tastes good. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google. Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat for a single woman. An unmarried girl is surrounded by many benefits and gains from watching her eat cooked meat, which expresses her glorification in many matters. There are happy signs linking her consumption, especially the roaster, and the blessing that The girl finds it in her life, because this dream leads to her happiness. As for beef, it promises her beautiful things that she will hear soon that will change the difficulty for the better, and perhaps she will be able to find

title: What is the interpretation of seeing whole spices in a dream?

preview.html: Hadota gives you an interpretation of seeing spices in a dream in full. It is known all over the world that spices or herbs are one of the main ingredients of home. In addition, seeing and tasting spices in a dream has many meanings and interpretations. Therefore, we have collected for you, dear followers, everything related to the interpretation of seeing spices. As well as the complete interpretation of ground black pepper in a dream, as well as the complete purchase of spices in a dream for the elderly, married and pregnant women, as well as men, from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. Why do you dream of spices? The interpretation of seeing problematic spices in a dream is one of the unwanted visions that indicate problems, worries and sadness.Also. Spices formed in a dream are a sign that the dreamer will lose a lot of money and important things in the next life. Seeing problematic spices indicates the death of children, God forbid, as well as anxiety, sadness, and the dreamer’s sins. Seeing whole spices in a dream, as Al-Nabulsi said about it, indicates the dreamer’s With exhaustion, injustice, longing, and sadness. See also: Why dream of a whole clove flower in a dream? Spices in a dream full of public women. Seeing red pepper in a dream full of public women, and its taste was beautiful and cold, is one of the visions that indicate the wedding date that is forever approaching. Eating spices in A full dream of a single girl testifies to the fact that she often cares about her appearance, adorns herself, and gives in to the devil. Buying spices in a dream for a single woman says that she has committed many sins and immoralities and she must quickly repent. See also: Why does pepper dream in a full dream? Spices in a dream are full of a married womanWhy dream A married woman with spices in a dream full of spices indicates that she and her family are facing financial difficulties and are suffering from sadness and tension. Also, seeing hot red pepper in a dream full of a married woman is evidence that he is suffering from some tension and fear of some things. Seeing cumin in a dream full of a married woman is considered... Praiseworthy visions, indicating that she and her husband will collect a lot of goodness and food. See also: Why do you dream of seeing salt in a complete dream? Why do you dream of spices for pregnant women? Cooking and preparing food with spices is a praiseworthy vision that shows the safety of the woman and her newborn from all problems and troubles. Seeing problem spices in a dream is one of the Unwanted visions that indicate some kind of problem in pregnancy and childbirth. Why dream of ground black pepper? Seeing ground black pepper in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the outbreak of disputes between the dreamer and a loved one. Also, seeing black pepper in a dream is a sign of many Problems and fears in the dreamer’s upcoming life. See also: Why dream of seeing a whole lemon in a dream? Why dream of turmeric for an ordinary woman? Some interpretation researchers stated that seeing turmeric in a dream full of an unmarried girl is evidence of relieving pain and getting rid of stress and problems that plague her.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a mill by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a mill in a dream for a single woman For a married woman For a pregnant woman For a divorced man For a man Mill Mill Mill Mill Mill Wheat Mill Milli Flour Ibn Sirin and others Seeing a mill in a dream There is no doubt that the vision makes many of us think and want to see a correct or accurate interpretation because of its meaning or significance in... His life and today, through our website, I present to you the interpretation of seeing the mill in a dream by the greatest scholars and dream interpreters.Interpretation of the mill in a dreamThe mill that grinds wheat indicates the house of knowledge in which truth is separated from falsehood, and the house of the ruler with income and production, measurement and balance, justice and righteousness, It indicates sustenance and benefit, and indicates spouses. Place two grains, one on top of the other, and between them the flour product. Perhaps it was the mill to show anxiety and suffering, or the water wheel to turn the wheel within itself. If the mill grinds people, it indicates turmoil and loss of souls. If you grind something inedible, this indicates drought and high prices. If there is a lot of flour and its warehouses are full, this indicates food, holidays, and recovery from diseases. As for the Ashnan mill, marshmallows, henna, and the like, they indicate purity, stopping diseases, removing worries, and settling debts. Interpretation of the mill in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The mill is the machine that grinds wheat, turns it into flour, and then makes bread from it. What is intended is for the mill to be the house of knowledge through which truth is separated from truth. Falsehood. Perhaps in some dreams, the mill indicates sadness and sorrow, and this depends on the vision, its location, and the person who sees it. Interpretation of the mill in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees the mill in a dream, and heavy flour comes out of it and the person who is spinning the mill is, this is evidence of engagement or marriage to someone. A good person in the near future, and if the girl is unmarried and sees in a dream that it points to a windmill in the distance, then this is evidence of the loss of anxiety, and the sadness will end soon, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a windmill in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman dreams that her husband owns a windmill, or That he spins the mill himself and brings out flour from it, this is evidence of the abundance of sustenance and many good things on its way. The mill is evidence of sustenance and goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the mill in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees the mill in her home in a dream, this is evidence of an easy and effortless birth, God willing, and it will also be natural for her and the newborn to be in good health now and after the birth. He is on the way for her and her husband, and the money is through trade, and God Almighty will provide them with it because it is a good path and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the mill in a dream for the divorced woman: If the divorced woman dreams that she is grinding wheat in the mill, and she is the one who runs the mill, and the flour comes out between the two rooms, then this is evidence of her victory over her husband. Enmity. Between her and others and you will gain from them, but if a divorced woman dreams that she sees someone standing grinding wheat and coming out
